mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.user_id AS userId, r.performance_id AS performanceId, p.title AS performanceTitle, p.performance_date AS performanceDate, r.reg_date AS regDate FROM reservation r INNER JOIN performance p ON r.performance_id = p.id WHERE r.id = #{id}

SELECT r.id, r.user_id AS userId, r.performance_id AS performanceId, p.title AS performanceTitle, p.performance_date AS performanceDate, r.reg_date AS regDate FROM reservation r INNER JOIN performance p ON r.performance_id = p.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.performance_id = #{performanceId}

SELECT r.id, r.user_id AS userId, r.performance_id AS performanceId, p.title AS performanceTitle, p.performance_date AS performanceDate, r.reg_date AS regDate FROM reservation r INNER JOIN performance p ON r.performance_id = p.id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.reg_date DESC
